sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PAYR0650 ( DIL_WRKR_INCM_BLGG_YR , DIL_WRKR_BLGG_QATR_DIV_CD , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , DIL_WRKR_INCM_PYMT_YR_MNTH , DIL_WRKR_INCM_DUTY_YR_MNTH , DIL_WRKR_INCM_DUTY_NUM_DYS , DIL_WRKR_INCM_TOT_PYMT_SUM , DIL_WRKR_FREE_DTY_INCM_SUM , DIL_WRKR_INCM_INCM_TX_SUM , DIL_WRKR_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM , DIL_WRKR_INCM_DATA_ARRGT_DT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dilWrkrIncmBlggYr# , #dilWrkrBlggQatrDivCd# , #payrMangDeptCd# , #dilWrkrIncmPymtYrMnth# , #dilWrkrIncmDutyYrMnth# , #dilWrkrIncmDutyNumDys# , #dilWrkrIncmTotPymtSum# , #dilWrkrFreeDtyIncmSum# , #dilWrkrIncmIncmTxSum# , #dilWrkrRgonIncmTxSum# , #dilWrkrIncmDataArrgtDt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PAYR0650 SET DIL_WRKR_INCM_BLGG_YR=#dilWrkrIncmBlggYr# , DIL_WRKR_BLGG_QATR_DIV_CD=#dilWrkrBlggQatrDivCd# , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd# , DIL_WRKR_INCM_PYMT_YR_MNTH=#dilWrkrIncmPymtYrMnth# , DIL_WRKR_INCM_DUTY_YR_MNTH=#dilWrkrIncmDutyYrMnth# , DIL_WRKR_INCM_DUTY_NUM_DYS=#dilWrkrIncmDutyNumDys# , DIL_WRKR_INCM_TOT_PYMT_SUM=#dilWrkrIncmTotPymtSum# , DIL_WRKR_FREE_DTY_INCM_SUM=#dilWrkrFreeDtyIncmSum# , DIL_WRKR_INCM_INCM_TX_SUM=#dilWrkrIncmIncmTxSum# , DIL_WRKR_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM=#dilWrkrRgonIncmTxSum# , DIL_WRKR_INCM_DATA_ARRGT_DT=#dilWrkrIncmDataArrgtDt# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DIL_WRKR_INCM_BLGG_YR=#dilWrkrIncmBlggYr# AND DIL_WRKR_BLGG_QATR_DIV_CD=#dilWrkrBlggQatrDivCd# AND PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PAYR0650 WHERE DIL_WRKR_INCM_BLGG_YR=#dilWrkrIncmBlggYr# AND DIL_WRKR_BLGG_QATR_DIV_CD=#dilWrkrBlggQatrDivCd# AND PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DIL_WRKR_INCM_BLGG_YR , DIL_WRKR_BLGG_QATR_DIV_CD , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , DIL_WRKR_INCM_PYMT_YR_MNTH , DIL_WRKR_INCM_DUTY_YR_MNTH , DIL_WRKR_INCM_DUTY_NUM_DYS , DIL_WRKR_INCM_TOT_PYMT_SUM , DIL_WRKR_FREE_DTY_INCM_SUM , DIL_WRKR_INCM_INCM_TX_SUM , DIL_WRKR_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM , DIL_WRKR_INCM_DATA_ARRGT_DT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PAYR0650 WHERE DIL_WRKR_INCM_BLGG_YR=#dilWrkrIncmBlggYr# AND DIL_WRKR_BLGG_QATR_DIV_CD=#dilWrkrBlggQatrDivCd# AND PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DIL_WRKR_INCM_BLGG_YR , DIL_WRKR_BLGG_QATR_DIV_CD , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , DIL_WRKR_INCM_PYMT_YR_MNTH , DIL_WRKR_INCM_DUTY_YR_MNTH , DIL_WRKR_INCM_DUTY_NUM_DYS , DIL_WRKR_INCM_TOT_PYMT_SUM , DIL_WRKR_FREE_DTY_INCM_SUM , DIL_WRKR_INCM_INCM_TX_SUM , DIL_WRKR_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM , DIL_WRKR_INCM_DATA_ARRGT_DT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PAYR0650 WHERE 1=1
DIL_WRKR_INCM_BLGG_YR = #searchKeyword#
DIL_WRKR_BLGG_QATR_DIV_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DIL_WRKR_INCM_BLGG_YR DESC , DIL_WRKR_BLGG_QATR_DIV_CD DESC , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PAYR0650 WHERE 1=1
DIL_WRKR_INCM_BLGG_YR = #searchKeyword#
DIL_WRKR_BLGG_QATR_DIV_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
